column3: Thanks, however this change isn't complete (the same string needs to be updated elsewhere in the repo), the commit message needs to be fixed i.e `doc: remove "experimental" from README.md` and it's the kind of change that will likely be nit-picked to death (i.e I think we're still experimenting), so I'm going to close.\n\nIf you're interested in [contributing](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/
